Judul: Collaborative application of computer technology in  interior design
Abstrak:
Computer-aided  indoor  design  is  a  communication-dense  process.  In  the  design, 
computer technology is usually needed to realize mutual data interaction, feedback and coordination 
as  well  as  promote  the  quality  and  efficiency  of  indoor  design  through  the  correlation  of data. 
Therefore,  from  the  perspective  of  computer  supported  environment,  the  paper  puts  forward  the 
most  explicit  requirements  on  cooperative  design,  i.e., by  adopting  a  series  of  software,  such  as CAD,  Revit,  BIM  and  so  on,  under  the  technological background  of  computer  supported 
cooperative work, the paper improves the maintenance and updating of each link in the design and 
construction  process,  thus  leading  to  a  great  and  overall  leap  of  indoor  design  based  on  the 
bidirectional associations between computer technology and cooperative design.
Kata Kunci: Computer technology ? Indoor design ? Cooperative design
Sumber: pplied Mechanics and Materials Vols. 651-653 (2014) pp 2067-2070 Submitted: 01.08.2014 © (2014) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland
